### SCENE 49 – Ritu Rumour & Pimple Panic  

**Ashesh:** Rey, *Ritu propose chesindanta*…  
_Arjun nods, one hand on left shoulder._

**Ashesh:** Mammaaa…  
**Arjun:** *Laagkuuu*…  
**Ashesh:** Mari party?  
**Arjun:** Aa *okkati adagakku*…  

_Small pause._

**Arjun:** Tana face-lo aa *pimples* chudu—*mudithe kandhipoyela* unnayi.  
**Ashesh:** Pimples mudithe **kandhi-pothayi** ra…  
**Arjun:** Oh!..

### SCENE 01 – Opening Voice-Over  
> VOICE (sarcastic): **Prema, ishq, kaadal, Mohabbat, love** … ila prathi language lo kuda ee word ki oo space undhi. Boothulu ki eppudyna intha perfect translation chusara? Undadhu. Very premium feeling andi idhi.  

**Hero:**  
* Prema ante headache ani okaru.  
* Adhi oka responsibility ee age lo enduku ani inkokaru.  
* Preminchalante maturity undali ani marokaru.  
* Deep-fry aipoindhi brain… ivanni vini.  

_Na jeevitham oka terichina pusthakam andi — actual ga grandham anali. Enno complicated feelings anni pack chesi perfect ga untayi… okkasari chaduvutha. Chustu vinandi 😉_

### SCENE 02 – Morning at Hero’s House  

_Location: Hero home — camera follows Gayatri from downstairs to the entrance._

_Gayatri knocks; Hero is still sleeping 🛏 😴 💤_

**Gayatri:** Rey… Annaya…  

> VOICE (background – Oppo Reno 2 jingle): **General ga naku alarms nacchavandi… natural ga levadam antene istam, anduke roju twaraga 10 ki legustha.**

_Hero opens his eyes, checks phone — **10:20**. Rushes to bathroom, toothbrush foam everywhere. Calls friend._

**Hero:** 5 min lo unta… bike tho ready ga undu…  
**H Friend:** Rey, manaki **sem holidays** ra…  
**Hero:** Oh..!  
**H Friend:** Adhi kadhu gaani—!  

_Cuts the call, throws brush, flops back on bed (foam still in mouth)._

_After some time (**12:13**) Hero comes downstairs for water 💧; mood serious. He winks at Gayatri (Tom-and-Jerry sting) and heads back up. Gayatri follows._

**Gayatri:** Annaya…  
_Hero turns._

**Hero:** Yes…?  
**Gayatri:** Eroju **nee results** ra…  
_Hero slips on the floor._

**Hero:** Oh..! (looks downstairs) Na kosamena mounam paatistunnaru… Subjects yemyna poyaya?  
**Gayatri:** 🤨  
**Hero:** (gasps) Enni pass ayya?  
**Gayatri:** 🤨  
**Hero:** Kaneesam **Drawing** aina…?  
**Gayatri:** Mm-hm… **Ledhu**.  

_Hero gets thoroughly scolded._

> VOICE (background): Ee thitlu kottha em kadhu… kaani ee sari kottha-kottha thitlu vinnanu. But sometimes you need to be shameless in life 😉. Kaani edhi aythe adhi ayyindi ani aa roju open aipoya.

**Hero:** Nenu **director avudhamani** anukuntunna…  

_Hero’s mother drops a vessel._  

**Hero:** Naku **1 year** time kavali. (softly) Passion, aim rendu veru ani… kaani na passion-inka-aim rendu okate…  

_Silence. Father and mother walk away._

---

### SCENE 26 – Awkward Coffee-Shop Meetup  

_Coffee shop. Heroine, Hero, a random girl, and Ash sit; Hero arrives late._

**Hero:** Hello everyone!  
**Heroine:** BTW, *tinu*—na friend **Sneha**.  
_Shake hands._

**Girl (Sneha):** Ippativarku mee gurinchi cheptundi. Asalu ela start aindhi? Eppudu kalisaru? Evaru first propose chesaru? _(raises brows)_  
**Aman (inner):** Cheppindhi annav kadha…  
**Heroine:** *Tane* propose chesadu.  
**Girl:** Eppudu kalisaru? What’s the magical date?  
**Heroine:** Cheppu…  

_Hero, hand on table, straightens, looks at Girl and Aman, nods._

**Aman (inner):** Ee details anni telusukoni jathakalu chusatadha enti? Book aipoyinaṭṭu unnade…  
**Heroine (intense):** Gurthuleda?  
**Aman:** Ikkada… _(searches)_ aquarium lo *rangu-rangula* chepalu untayi, telusa?  
**Heroine:** Aman… please.  
**Hero (inner):** Rangu‐rangula chepala… rangulu, rangulu ante Holi. Ala antav enti? Actual-ga Holi-roju chusa, kani matladindhi next-day kadha—aa roju chepdama ani…  
**Girl:** Oh, sweet!  
**Heroine:** Sorryyy—*marchipoyav* annukunna.  
**Hero:** Marchipovadama? Aina adhi ela marchipotha, cheppu.  
**Aman:** _(looks up guiltily)_  

_Attharintiki Daaredhi climax-music swell; hand-hold moment._

**Sneha:** You know, long-distance relationships general-ga workout avavu—but nuvvu oppukunnavu ante… great asalu. *Maya* U.S.-lo, nuvvu ikkada—kastam kadha…  
_Faces react._

**Hero:** Naku enduku cheppaledhu?  
**Maya:** Arjun… adhi… cheppadam anukunnanu…  
**Aman:** *Shit*… _(whispers)_ Flight… _(eyes widen)_  
**Maya:** Inko two days lo…  
_Arjun rises abruptly; Aman stays seated, Maya follows Hero._

<!-- lang: en+te | end Scene 26 -->

### SCENE 27 – The Search for Arjun  

_Aman and Swarna sit on a roadside divider; Maya rushes up._

**Maya:** Mundhe cheppalsindhi—*nadhe tappu*…  
**Aman:** U.S deniki?  
**Maya:** *Computer-Science M.S* seat vacchindhi.  
**Aman:** Study kosame ga; kurchoni matladithe set aipothadi le.  
    Ekkadiki vellipoyadu eeduu… mobile switched-off vastundi.  
**Maya:** Okkasari elaayna matladali, Aman—just once.  
**Aman:** *Sare*, padha velli vethukudham.  

_Ashesh waits outside a house; Maya exits the gate, shakes her head in regret. Ashesh speed-dials everyone._

**Aman:** Nuvvu inka vellu—somehow I’ll find him. At least call cheyyamani chepta…  
_Disperse._

### SCENE 10 – Niha Visits Hero’s Room  

_Hero walks out; Niha enters, looks around. Hero re-enters._

**Niha:** Ou…! Hello.  
**Arjun:** Hi…!  
**Niha:** Shwetha rammannadhi…  
**Arjun:** Hmm—tanadhi pakka room.  
**Niha:** Oh… _starts to leave_  
**Arjun:** Aina… chelli intlo ledhu…  
**Niha:** Avna? _checks phone_ Call chesindi—rammani… _low voice_  
**Arjun:** Yeah… vacchestadhi. _gestures_ Please…  
_Niha sits on the bed; Arjun grabs a chair. She notices stacks of papers._

**Niha:** Enti ivanni?  
**Arjun:** Actually naku **direction** ante interest… so—  
**Niha:** Oh! Script papers aa? Nice!  
**Arjun:** Y-y-yeah.  
**Niha:** Enni movie scripts ivi?  
**Arjun:** Oka short film vi…  
**Niha:** Oh.  
**Arjun:** So… **Aadhya Ramakrishnan**—Tamil?  
_Niha skims pages, smiles._  
**Niha:** Yes.  
**Arjun:** Tamil ela nerchukunedhi?  
**Niha:** Oka manchi Tamil friend unte nerchukovochu. _stands, walks to door_  
**Arjun:** Naku nerchukovali ani undhi… _steps closer_  
**Niha:** First Telugu nerchuko—script lo anni pacchi buthulu unnayi.  
**Arjun:** *Ou!*  
_Phone rings._

**Arjun (on phone):** Aa… cheppu. Ha, ikkade undi—Shwetha… _hands phone to Niha_  
**Niha:** Ha Shwetha, ha… vastunnam. _cuts call_  
**Niha:** Temple daggara undhi anta—rammantundhi.  
**Arjun:** Temple ka? **NO way.**

_Scene cuts: Arjun now riding pillion side-saddle on Niha’s bike._

_Hero at the hills, voice-over:_

> VOICE (Hero): **Spoorty** recover avvadaniki peddha time patledhu, kani nenu teesukunna two-years time matram aagatledhu. Script raasukunna, inka aa **Aman** (“nenu camera handle chesta…”), ma **Golu** (“editing nenu chusukunta le Maya”) …

_In VUDA Park — Hero is late; Aman and Maya pick up the conversation._

### SCENE 21 – Niha’s Terrace Talk  

_Niha’s house terrace. She’s folding clothes._

**Hero:** Baledu… em set avvatle…  
**Niha:** Nuvvu emi Tharun Bhascker oo Trivikram oo kadhu; ippude start chestunnav kadha… alane untadi.  
**Hero:** Konchem aina confidence undali kadha.  
**Niha:** Em parledhu—ivanni chepukodaniki baguntay. Taruvatha press-conference-lona “Arjun gurinchi cheppandi” ani naku mike icchinappudu…  
**Hero:** Ooooooo aagu, antha dooram vellaku!  
_Both laugh._

**Niha:** Shwetha ela undhi?  
**Arjun:** _(still laughing, nods)_  
**Niha:** Mari **Maya**?  
**Arjun:** Tanake… chala bagundhi.  
**Niha:** Repu edho plan chestunnav anta—Aman cheppadu.  
**Arjun:** Tana birthday repu.  
**Niha:** Aythe plan **ee night**-kada cheyyali.  
**Arjun:** Tanu puttina time **4 p.m.** anta; paiga *Hasta* 2-padam, mana *Mrugasira* tho manchi communication undhi—ikkada *Makaram*, akkada *Midhunam*… deadly idhi!  
**Niha:** _(laughs)_ Velli jathakalu chepko; thanaki telusa, birthday kosam pilichav ani.  
**Arjun:** “Surprise” ani cheppa.  
**Niha:** Yemyndra mee abbalaki—thana birthday-roju “surprise” ante aa matram telidha aa ammayiki? Burra vaadandi ra! **Abaddham** aadadam tappu kadhu; **aadi dorikipovadam** tappu. Abaddham aadithe *atukunnattu* undali.  
**Arjun:** Mee daggara chala nerchukovali, guruji.  
**Niha:** Na saktulu anni daara‐postunna; vichchahla-vidiga vaadesko.

### SCENE 26 – Awkward Coffee-Shop Meetup  

_Coffee shop. Heroine, Hero, a random girl, and Ash sit; Hero arrives late._

**Hero:** Hello everyone!  
**Heroine:** BTW, *tinu*—na friend **Sneha**.  
_Shake hands._

**Girl (Sneha):** Ippativarku mee gurinchi cheptundi. Asalu ela start aindhi? Eppudu kalisaru? Evaru first propose chesaru? _(raises brows)_  
**Aman (inner):** Cheppindhi annav kadha…  
**Heroine:** *Tane* propose chesadu.  
**Girl:** Eppudu kalisaru? What’s the magical date?  
**Heroine:** Cheppu…  

_Hero, hand on table, straightens, looks at Girl and Aman, nods._

**Aman (inner):** Ee details anni telusukoni jathakalu chusatadha enti? Book aipoyinaṭṭu unnade…  
**Heroine (intense):** Gurthuleda?  
**Aman:** Ikkada… _(searches)_ aquarium lo *rangu-rangula* chepalu untayi, telusa?  
**Heroine:** Aman… please.  
**Hero (inner):** Rangu‐rangula chepala… rangulu, rangulu ante Holi. Ala antav enti? Actual-ga Holi-roju chusa, kani matladindhi next-day kadha—aa roju chepdama ani…  
**Girl:** Oh, sweet!  
**Heroine:** Sorryyy—*marchipoyav* annukunna.  
**Hero:** Marchipovadama? Aina adhi ela marchipotha, cheppu.  
**Aman:** _(looks up guiltily)_  

_Attharintiki Daaredhi climax-music swell; hand-hold moment._

**Sneha:** You know, long-distance relationships general-ga workout avavu—but nuvvu oppukunnavu ante… great asalu. *Maya* U.S.-lo, nuvvu ikkada—kastam kadha…  
_Faces react._

**Hero:** Naku enduku cheppaledhu?  
**Maya:** Arjun… adhi… cheppadam anukunnanu…  
**Aman:** *Shit*… _(whispers)_ Flight… _(eyes widen)_  
**Maya:** Inko two days lo…  
_Arjun rises abruptly; Aman stays seated, Maya follows Hero._

### SCENE 08 – Coffee-Shop Banter  

_Swarna and Arjun sit opposite each other._

**Swarna:** Cheppu.  
**Arjun:** Cappuccino with almond milk…  
**Swarna:** Order cheppamanaledhu—*enduku follow chestunnav adhi?*  
**Arjun:** Adha…! Konthamandhi chudagane nacchutaru; andulo chala-kontha mandhi manaki friends avutaru. Friends circle undatam manchidhe kada, aa circle lo mimmalni kuda add cheddamani.  
**Swarna:** So friendship kosam antav…  
**Arjun:** Exactly.  
**Swarna:** Friendship taruvatha love ante?  
**Arjun:** *Nakanna mundhu meere propose chesthe?*  
**Swarna:** Anduke… ee talanoppi antha enduku, cheppu.  
**Arjun:** Life plain ga velte em baavuntadhi? Cheppandi. Aina nene edo force ga convince chestunnattu undi… k, then it was meeting you. B-ye.  
**Swarna:** _extends hand_ **Swarna.** Shake-hand icchinappudu teesukovadam manners telusa?  
**Arjun:** Teesukunte vadalanu mari… **Arjun.**  

_Shake hands.  Arjun hesitates between milk-coffee and black coffee._

**Arjun:** Boyfriend unara?  
**Swarna:** *Nope*… (sips). **Neeku?**  
**Arjun:** Cha-cha—naku **boyfriends** evaru leru.  
_Swarna bursts a laugh, almost spills her drink._

**Swarna:** Em chestu untaru meeru?  
_Scene cuts._
